portfolio.title: Handwriting Text Recognition
portfolio.description: A deep learning-based application that recognizes and converts handwritten text into digital format using image processing techniques

portfolio.title: College Predictor
portfolio.description: A Java application that predicts potential college admissions based on user academic input and historical cutoff data

portfolio.title: RFID Healthcare Card
portfolio.description: A smart healthcare card system using RFID technology to securely store and retrieve patient medical data for quick access during emergencies

portfolio.title: Smart Dustbin
portfolio.description: An IoT-based smart dustbin using sensors and C++ to automate lid movement and monitor waste levels for efficient disposal management

portfolio.title: Stock Market - Web App
portfolio.description: A responsive web application that enables real-time stock tracking, portfolio management, sentiment analysis, and financial insights to enhance user experience and support data-driven investment decisions

portfolio.title: Food Ordering System
portfolio.description: A dynamic web-based food ordering platform enabling users to browse menus, place orders, and manage carts in real time

portfolio.title: Event-Ease
portfolio.description: An end-to-end event management web app that allows users to create, browse, and register for events with a user-friendly interface

portfolio.title: CareerLens
portfolio.description: AI-powered career coaching platform that generate personalized insights, resumes, cover letters, and interview preparation tools for job seekers.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern (IT Operations)
experience.description: Developed internal web applications and RESTful APIs to automate IT asset management workflows, reducing manual tracking errors by 30%. I also restructured the Configuration Management Database (CMDB) with improved data models and implemented real-time Power BI dashboards with built-in alerting mechanisms, which increased asset tracking accuracy by 25% and sped up incident response. Additionally, I conducted API testing and debugging using Postman, performed QA validation for backend integrations and data flows, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth, reliable deployments.

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
experience.description: Delivered dynamic, responsive, and reusable React components using Bootstrap, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and accessibility aligned with WCAG guidelines, which led to a 35% improvement in site performance. I integrated RESTful APIs and managed asynchronous data flows using Axios, working closely with designers and fellow developers to deliver a seamless user experience that boosted user engagement by 20%. I also contributed to code quality and maintainability by implementing modular UI patterns, conducting code reviews, and enforcing consistency through tools like Prettier and Chrome DevTools audits.
